mapper.select: select * from tbl_buy_applicant where BOARD_SEQ=#{num} and DEL_YN = 'n'
select * from tbl_account_applicant where BOARD_SEQ=#{num} and DEL_YN = 'n'

select * from tbl_free_applicant where BOARD_SEQ=#{num} and DEL_YN = 'n'
